content: Describe three famous landmarks from different parts of the world, presenting them in CSV format with columns for Name, Location, Year Built, and Architectural Style.

Sure! Here are three famous landmarks from different parts of the world presented in CSV format:

"Name","Location","Year Built","Architectural Style"

"Eiffel Tower","Paris, France","1889","Industrial"

"Great Pyramid of Giza","Giza, Egypt","c. 2560 BC","Ancient Egyptian"

"Petronas Twin Towers","Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia","1998","Postmodern"

Please note that the "Year Built" for the Great Pyramid of Giza is approximate, as it was constructed over several years.
